title: Association Evidence
description: Contains links to items that have associations by some evidence and the information about the evidence

subject_item.title: Subject Item
subject_item.description: Association through evidence can be directional and if so subject-object roles can be assigned - if the association is non-directional the assignment to subject-object may be arbitrary

object_item.title: Object Item
object_item.description: Association through evidence can be directional and if so subject-object roles can be assigned - if the association is non-directional the assignment to subject-object may be arbitrary

relationship_name.title: Relationship Name
relationship_name.description: Name of the type of relationship that makes the association

relationship_dbid.title: Relationship Term ID
relationship_dbid.description: Ontology term ID associated with the relationship
